original_title: Djabe: Live in Blue with Steve Hackett, Gulli Briem and John Nugent
overview: This concert film was recorded in Budapest, at the Pecsa Music Hall. It was one of the live surround shows of the Down And Up album tour. The album and the tour, especially the live 5.1 audio experience meant a milestone in the band’s history. At the show even the lights turned blue. This show is a really unbeatable performance in the jazz / world scene.
title: Djabe: Live in Blue with Steve Hackett, Gulli Briem and John Nugent
